title: Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton hold hands as they land in LA after a mini birthday vacation
text:
They celebrated her birthday together on Thursday at her home in Los Angeles.

But an at-home celebration was just the first part of Gwen Stefani's 50th birthday party.

She and her beau of nearly four years, Blake Shelton, were seen holding hands after touching down in Los Angeles after a mini-birthday vacation.

Mid-century celebrations: Gwen Stefani, 50, her beau of nearly four years, Blake Shelton, 43, were seen holding hands after touching down in Los Angeles after a mini-birthday vacation on Sunday

The No Doubt frontwoman, 50, wore a fall-inspired camouflage jacket with black yoga pants for the travel day.

On her pants, the words 'SPIRITUAL GANGSTER' could be seen emblazoned in shiny black.

Stefani wore her blonde locks up in a bun and sported a pair of classic slip-on Vans on her feet.

She accessorized with retro round shades and a number of necklaces.

Fall-inspired: The No Doubt frontwoman wore a fall-inspired camouflage jacket with black yoga pants for the travel day

As she was spotted deplaning the private jet, the Don't Speak singer could be seen carrying a classic camouflage bag as an assistant followed closely behind.

Shelton, 43, wore jeans for the flight, pairing them with button-up blue polo and black hiking boots.

The country crooner wore a cap on his head and carried his iPhone in his hand.



Decked out: As she was spotted deplaning the private jet, the Don't Speak singer could be seen carrying a classic camouflage bag as an assistant followed closely behind

Just a few days ago on Thursday, the couple celebrated Stefani's 50th birthday at her home in Los Angeles and Shelton made sure his sweetheart of nearly four years was appreciated.

The Ol' Red singer was seen bringing a Hansen's cake into his partner's home, and Stefani took to Instagram to share a few snaps of the grand fete.

In addition to the big colorful cake, there were pies from Susie's Cakes and other goodies like a table full of colorful roses.

According to ET, Shelton has another party planned for his lady love.

Birthday bash: Just a few days ago on Thursday, the couple celebrated Stefani's 50th birthday at her home in Los Angeles and Shelton made sure his sweetheart of nearly four years was appreciated

Party favors: In addition to the big colorful cake, there were pies from Susie's Cakes and other goodies like a table full of colorful roses

The Boys 'Round Here hitmaker wants his partner to have a birthday she'll never forget this year, especially being that it's a milestone birthday.

The singer not only planned the duo's mini-vacation, but he's also got another big bash planned around Halloween for her.

'Gwen is turning 50 and she's over the moon about it. She feels confident in her age and she is completely in love,' a source told Entertainment Tonight.

'Blake wants to make her feel special. He's planning a big party for her, he is going all out! It's a costume party. Gwen is a huge costume lover. She has always loved dressing up for Halloween,' they added.

The couple started working together in 2014 on the singing-competition show The Voice, but it would be more than a year before they would go public with their romance in November of 2015.

At the time, Shelton was recently divorced from then-wife Miranda Lambert and Stefani was working through her divorce with husband of 13 years, Gavin Rossdale.

Stefani has three kids with Rossdale: Kingston, 13, Zuma, 11, and Apollo, 5.

In September, the Hollaback hitmaker told the Today show that Shelton is helpful when it comes to helping raise her sons, even though he doesn't have any children of her own.

'He is a good dad, actually,' she said.
description: They celebrated her birthday together on Thursday at her home in Los Angeles. But an at-home celebration was just the first part of Gwen Stefani's 50th birthday party.
